item.title: Email to French law professor Yves Strickler
item.description: From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Subject: : Bonne Année! Date sent: January 27, 2023, 16:53 (Beijing time) To: Yves Strickler Cc: Many people including the FBI and the State Department, I will update this section later Dear Professor Strickler, Thank you for reminding me to pay close attention to compliance. You are absolutely right! Please don’t worry if you don’t immediately have the time to read all of the emails I am CCing to you regarding the pattern of racketeering activity McDonald’s Corporation has engaged into.
